name: Conversations (Claire Preston)
description:
Conversations is a text-based game about lonliness and interuptions in lonliness. It simulates conversations I have had and wish I could have had with both others and myself. Simple and minimal, it is meant to be played slowly and repetitively. 

This game saw many different narratives before settling on this one that is part memory and part fiction. The conversation displayed is a collage of conversations from the past and future, real and hoped for. 

Play by clicking through the conversation options. This can be played in your browser. Enjoy :)
